backend/main.mo: Actor implementing chatrooms, messages, user profiles, reactions, and access control with storage, plus data types and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their functionality and recent updates.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry with TanStack Router defining lobby and chatroom routes, shared layout, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog allowing users to upload, preview, or remove custom avatars with validation and mutations.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat UI showing messages, pinned video, live user count, replies, auto-scroll, and message sending logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails from YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter and fetches thumbnails dynamically.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or video/Twitter URL input.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op component intentionally rendering nothing to avoid authentication flows.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders chat messages with reactions, timestamps, media previews, Twitter embeds, and reply/pin actions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides a message composer supporting text, images, YouTube/Twitch links, Twitter URLs, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it from the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that plays audio messages with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synchronized pausing of other audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chat-related data, including chatrooms, search, filtering, and user metadata helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styles, layout resets, and mobile input adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Contains a number formatter that converts large numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for parsing YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating corresponding IDs, thumbnails, and embed links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Fetches a chatroom, increments view count once, handles loading/error states, and renders ChatArea when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays and filters chatrooms with search and category options, handles loading/error states, and allows navigation and room creation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and loads typography, container-query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, and constraints for replacing view counts with live user counts while maintaining full anonymity.
